name: Bowling Dash
description:
--   CONTROLS   --

A - Go Left

D - Go Right

Space - Jump (Hold for jump higher)

Left Shift - Dash (Hold for go further)

--   DESCRIPTION   --

Bowling dash is a very short simple platformer game where you must use your dashes carefully. You'll have limited dash amount each level. 

This game was made in 3 days. Have Fun!
